name: Disk Knight
description:
Entry for GBJAM 8

You play a knight on a mission to deliver data to a computer. But, due to his heavy armor, he is unable to effectively traverse without the use of his trusty jumping disk.

Controls:

Press A to jump

HOLD S to throw disk

Arrow keys to move

R to reset the level

Credits:

The amazing game art and cover done by Sypsic (check her insta @sypsis_art)
